main event: A resident of Riverside, California observed an unidentified flying object, a dark, disc-shaped craft, on November 7, 1951.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 1:15 p.m, The object was described as dark and flattened, with an estimated diameter of 25 to 50 feet, The estimated altitude of the object was between 10,000 to 15,000 feet, The observer was a resident of San Bernardino, California, The object was visible for approximately 30 seconds before disappearing.
